alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pasco and northwestern Pinellas Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hudson to Clearwater. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, New Port Richey, Hudson, Holiday, Palm Harbor, Jasmine Estates, New Port Richey East, East Lake, Beacon Square, Safety Harbor, Oldsmar, Trinity, Elfers, Bayonet Point and Crystal Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
